refnamediv.refpurpose: Modify records in a LDB database

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbmodify changes, adds and deletes records in a LDB database. The changes that should be made to the LDB database are read from the specified LDIF-file. If - is specified as the filename, input is read from stdin.
For now, see ldapmodify(1) for details on the LDIF file format.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(3) for details.
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)
